'''Targon''' was a man of [[Gondor]] during the [[War of the Ring]].

==History==
Targon worked at the storehouse and buttery for the [[Guards of the Citadel]] in [[Minas Tirith]]. On the morning of [[9 March]], {{TA|3019}}<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref> he gave [[Beregond]] and [[Peregrin Took]] food and drink for a picnic.<ref>{{RK|V1}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2001-2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'':'''
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians riding with [[Faramir]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' as Targon.

[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Targon.jpg|thumb|150px|left|Targon in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''2015: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Targon can be found on the sixth level of the pre-battle [[Minas Tirith]]. He has no lines and plays no role in the storyline.
